text_info_home_1: Immerse yourself in a world of knowledge on our website, which includes educational materials to improve your experience in various fields
text_info_home_4: Learn something new and useful. Publish your plans or presentations to share your experience with other users.
text_info_home_6: See the list of tools for your job, where links to these tools and their descriptions will be provided.
text_info_home_8: Create your own private team to share interesting topics and ideas with other members.
text_info_home_10: On our site, you can share interesting content that can inspire others to take action or to better themselves.
text_info_home_11: Get friendly support from our team at any time, because we are here to help each other overcome challenges, achieve goals and share the joy of success.
text_info_home_13: Friends with common interests and goals can be the key to successful cooperation and shared experiences.
text_info_home_14: We are always open to communication and ready to help you with any questions you may have. Don't hesitate to contact us with your suggestions, comments, concerns or questions. Your opinion is important to us and we strive to ensure your satisfaction with our website.
text_info_home_15: Fill in the form below or contact us using the contact details provided and we will try to get back to you as soon as possible.
text_info_about_3: Our website is a platform for communication between teachers, where they can share their activities, files, plans and presentations to facilitate their work and improve the teaching process.
text_info_about_5: File sharing: teachers can upload and share documents, presentations and other materials.
text_info_about_6: Collaborative planning: possibility to create and edit lesson plans and curricula together.
text_info_about_7: Creating teams: any user can create their team to carry out projects, develop plans or other activities with their colleagues.
text_info_about_8: Integration with tools: access to third-party tools that facilitate teachers' work, with direct links to them.
text_info_about_10: Our mission is to provide teachers with a convenient and effective platform for collaboration, knowledge sharing and resources. We strive to make the teaching process as productive and interesting as possible for both teachers and students.
text_info_about_12: We understand the importance of collaboration and knowledge sharing in the educational environment. Our platform offers:
text_info_about_13: Ease of use: intuitive interface that doesn't require lengthy training.
text_info_about_14: Data security: we guarantee a high level of protection for your data and materials.
text_info_about_15: community: an active community of teachers ready to help and share their knowledge and experience.
text_info_about_17: If you have any questions or suggestions, don't hesitate to contact us:
no_user_activity_data_1: You haven't had any activity yet
text_info_settings_4: The security of your password is extremely important. Make sure you don't share your password with anyone and choose a strong password that is difficult to guess. Using a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters, numbers and symbols can significantly strengthen your account security.
text_info_settings_5: When you delete your account, you lose access to Front account services and we permanently delete your personal data. You can cancel the deletion for 14 days.
text_info_settings_6: Confirm that I want to delete my account.
no_user_team_data: You don't have any team yet.
text_no_team_data_2: You do not belong to any team yet. Click on the icon to find your team.
text_info_setiting_team_1: Add new members to your project
text_info_setiting_team_2: Invited people will be added to your team
text_info_setiting_team_4: Changing the roles of team members
text_info_no_comments_1: There are no comments here yet.
text_info_sign_in_1: You don't have an account yet?
name: Name
text_info_send_email_2: Enter the email address you used to register and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.
text_info_reset_password_2: Try refreshing the site or following the link sent to gmail again
text_info_admin_page_4: Care must be taken when creating a new record to avoid overwriting or corrupting data. It is also important to take into account the structure of the table and the format of the data to ensure that the new record fits correctly into the existing context.
